markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 6"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Demolishing](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1464)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder Special: Fumbus](/Sources.aspx?ID=105) pg. 0</row>

**Price** 225 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** etched onto a weapon

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

A _demolishing_ weapon is made to destroy constructs. Damage inflicted on a construct with a _demolishing_ weapon continues to spread throughout the creature—cracks form, linkages fail, surfaces erode—and otherwise dismantle its body. When you damage a construct using a _demolishing_ weapon, you deal an extra 1d6 persistent force damage. On a critical hit, you deal an extra 1d12 persistent force damage instead.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Demolishing

Damage inflicted on a construct with a demolishing weapon continues to spread throughout the creature—cracks form, linkages fail, surfaces erode—and otherwise dismantle its body. When you damage a construct using a demolishing weapon, you deal an extra 1d6 persistent force damage. On a critical hit, you deal an extra 1d12 persistent force damage instead.
